scripts.watch: nodemon -e js,jsx,ts,tsx --watch "medusa-plugin/src" --spawn --exec "cd medusa-plugin && yarn run prepare && cd .. && yarn run rsync && cd dev/medusa && yarn run dev" --delay 1 --verbose
scripts.start: cd medusa-plugin && yarn run prepare && cd .. && yarn run rsync && cd dev/medusa && yarn run build && cd ../.. && concurrently "yarn run watch" "cd dev/medusa-storefront && yarn run dev" --timings --prefix "[{index}] [{time}] =>"
